member.name: T:Ellucian.Web.Mvc.Extensions.HtmlHelperExtensions
member.summary: Provides extension helper methods for properly creating visual content and markup (e.g. action links) throughout the MVC application stack.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Web.Mvc.Extensions.HtmlHelperExtensions.BuildHelpContentId(System.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelper)
member.summary: Creates the Help content ID for the current view context.
member.param: Base object for use of extension method
member.returns: The Help content ID for the current view context

member.name: M:Ellucian.Web.Mvc.Extensions.HtmlHelperExtensions.PartialIfExists(System.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelper,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Builds the markup string for a Partial View, if the requested view exists and is accessible.
member.param: Base object for use of extension method
The name of the view to attempt to retrieve
The controller associated with where the view is located
The modular area associated with where the view is located
member.returns: The full markup string, as an MvcHtmlString, for this Partial View, if it exists. Otherwise an empty string is returned.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Web.Mvc.Extensions.HtmlHelperExtensions.MenuListItem(System.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelper,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a menu link to be used within a list structure.
member.param: Base object for use of extension method
The text to display for the link
The action to call when clicked
The controller in which the associated action resides
The area of Student Planning to which this link is associated
An ID to attach to the anchor
The class to apply when the menu item is selected
member.returns: An MvcHtmlString representing the full link for the menu item

member.name: M:Ellucian.Web.Mvc.Extensions.HtmlHelperExtensions.MenuLink(System.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelper,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new link for use on a menu in an MVC application.
member.param: Base object for use of extension method
The text to display for the link
The class to apply when the menu item is selected
The action to call when clicked
The controller in which the associated action resides
The area of Student Planning to which this link is associated
Any MVC route values for the link

An override action declaration for making certain menu items appear active when they do not match the default check. For example, if you want the link which corresponds to the /Foo/Bar action to be active when you hit the Foo/Index action, pass Index for this value. Overrides can only be applied within a controller; there is no way to activate a menu item when in an entirely separate controller.
member.returns: An MvcHtmlString representing the full link for the menu item

member.name: M:Ellucian.Web.Mvc.Extensions.HtmlHelperExtensions.MenuLinkSpan(System.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelper,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new link for use on a menu in an MVC application, with the link text surrounded by a tag within the anchor. For example, if the link text is "test", the resulting link markup would be test.
member.param: Base object for use of extension method
The text to display for the link
The class to apply when the menu item is selected
The action to call when clicked
The controller in which the associated action resides
The area of Student Planning to which this link is associated
Any MVC route values for the link

An override action declaration for making certain menu items appear active when they do not match the default check. For example, if you want the link which corresponds to the /Foo/Bar action to be active when you hit the Foo/Index action, pass Index for this value. Overrides can only be applied within a controller; there is no way to activate a menu item when in an entirely separate controller.
member.returns: An MvcHtmlString representing the full link for the menu item, with the anchor text surrounded by a SPAN.

member.name: T:Ellucian.Web.Mvc.Filter.AddHttpResponseHeaderCustomFilterAttribute
member.summary: Adds response headers to a controller's actions using HttpResponseBase.AppendHeader(). Example usage: [HttpResponseHeaderCustom("headerName1,headerName2", "value1,value2")] Note: if adding a header that is already on a response, the existing header will not have its value overwritten or appended to by AppendHeader(). Instead, another header with the same name will be added.

member.name: T:Ellucian.Web.Mvc.Filter.ValidateAntiForgeryTokenCustomFilterAttribute
member.summary: Applies the ValidateAntiForgeryTokenCustom filter to all action methods in the controller. It validates the antiforgery token for requests that are: 1) AJAX-based - both POST and GET (antiforgery token stored as a request header) 2) non-AJAX-based - POST only (antiforgery token stored in POST body as a parameter)

member.summary: Separates the JWT into smaller strings based on the chunk size. The first will be a smaller chunk of 800 suitable for storing in a FormAuthenticationTicket userdata property. The rest will be up to the chunk size.
member.param: The jwt to separate into chunks
